item.description: happy earth day! i won’t get to do a lot of celebrating today, because i’m busy with work and then going out to dinner and a movie (the northman).

item.title: earth day
item.description: ways to celebrate: spend some time in nature pick up trash outside

item.title: listen to nature
item.description: be mindful of your impact on #nature. not just in the ways that you change it, but in the people, organizations, and ideas you support.

item.title: new year's day
item.description: the first day of the new calendar year, january 1st. i enjoy getting together with friends, especially with a bike ride!

item.title: solar
item.description: the solar cycle is celebrated on eight holidays. there are two solstices, two equinoxes, and four cross quarter days. because i live in the modern world, my year begins january 1st and ends december 31st.

item.title: uplift the marginalized
item.description: this goes hand-in-hand with don’t punch down. use your privilege to uplift those who are without it. #donate to causes that uplift others.
